plugins.prepareCmd: sed -i 's/^version: .*/version: ${nextRelease.version}/' charts/enginsight/Chart.yaml && UI_TAG=$(awk '/ui:/{f=1;next} f && /tag:/{gsub(/"/, "", $2); print $2; exit}' charts/enginsight/values.yaml) && sed -i "s/^appVersion: .*/appVersion: \"$UI_TAG\"/" charts/enginsight/Chart.yaml
